strapiPost.title: Community Created and Community Driven Sustainability
strapiPost.content:
Ozark Compost was created to drive positive environmental impacts in NWA through convenient compost pickup and zero-waste product delivery. Join the hundreds of homes and businesses that have already diverted more than 80,000 lbs of food waste from local landfills with Ozark Compost.

  • Convenient composting: With easy-to-follow compost guides, customer support, and text notifications, composting could not be easier. Fill up your 5-gal bucket with compostable items, and OCS will pick it up and deliver a clean one weekly or bi-weekly. You can even receive givebacks for garden use.
  • Conscious consumption: Include a ground or whole-bean Airship coffee subscription with your deliveries, and find other eco-friendly, zero-waste products on Ozark Compost's online shop.

The first 10 NWA Daily readers to sign up will receive a free month of bi-weekly pickups. Add a coffee subscription, and we'll throw in a refillable coffee canister. Use code OCS2023 or click HERE.
